text: St. John's Island may refer to: * Saint John's Island, in Singapore * St. John's Island, Egypt * Shangchuan Island, in China, as translated * St. Ivan Island, in Bulgaria (Ivan is the Bulgarian name corresponding to John) * Prince Edward Island, which was known as St. John's Island before November 29, 1798 * Saint John, U.S. Virgin Islands
title: St. John's Island
